title: Energy highway
creator_credit: Dennis Hill Productions, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: This film shows the construction of a natural gas pipeline stretching half way across Australia. Made for the Pipeline Authority, this film shows the immensity of the task and the people involved in achieving this feat
creator_credit_for_label: Dennis Hill Productions, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
